1375600.name: Skully Original Soundtrack
1375600.description:
Skully, a reanimated skull, has been summoned to intervene in a war between a deity and his three siblings whose quarrel jeopardizes the island they call home. Skully will explore many wonderous environments on the island, each with a unique atmosphere met with masterfully composed music by John Hagley, Jamie Pennock, and Adam Damelin.

Tracklisting:

1 On Our Way
2 Meeting A Friend
3 River Rush
4 Up In The Air
5 Smoulder and Burn
6 Conflict
7 A Mother's Love
8 Determination
9 Spirit of Adventure
10 The Final Battle
11 Broken Heart
12 Journey's End
13 On A Roll
